definition[0]: someone who is vain is too proud of their good looks, abilities, or position – used to show disapproval
example[0]: Men can be just as vain as women.
definition[1]: a vain attempt, hope, or search fails to achieve the result you wanted
example[1]: The young mother died in a vain attempt to save her drowning son.
heading[0]: – Meaning 3: a vain attempt, hope, or search fails to achieve the result you wanted
example[2]: People close their windows at night in a vain attempt to shut out the sound of gunfire.
example[3]: Young men moved south in the vain hope of finding work.
example[4]: Mothers have been to every shop in town in a vain search for the toy.
